summary: Project includes a request to create a new logo.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Redesign the logo with a fresh look while keeping a clean, healthcare-appropriate style (mahalaxmi-health-care-logo.dim_512x512.png > mahalaxmi-health-care-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Update the 32x32 favicon to match the new logo (mahalaxmi-health-care-favicon.dim_32x32.png > mahalaxmi-health-care-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- Update the 192x192 favicon to match the new logo (mahalaxmi-health-care-favicon.dim_192x192.png > mahalaxmi-health-care-favicon.dim_192x192.png)
- Update the 180x180 Apple touch icon to match the new logo (mahalaxmi-health-care-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png > mahalaxmi-health-care-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new brand logo for "Mahalaxmi Health Care" and update the appâ€™s existing logo assets so the new logo appears in the site header and footer.
Update the site favicon and Apple touch icon assets to match the new logo, keeping the filenames referenced by the HTML head so browsers pick up the new branding without code changes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a new logo for the project

projectName: Create and apply a new logo set (header/footer + favicons)
